name: chatbot-gpt
description: chatbot webapplication using LLM api to generate reponse

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd backend && npm install && node src/server.js
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
